A letter to Dr. Bvrnet occasioned by his late letter to Mr. Lowth. Lowth, Simon, 1630?-1720.
7 p.
Printed for Randal Taylor ..., London : 1685.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Attributed to Simon Lowth. cf. NUC pre-1956. Caption title. Imprint taken from colophon.
